mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Moseer, Frederich Patient Age: 38. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture right ankle. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Minie ball. Result: Discharged from service.
